name: Cake Face
description:
my first ever processing sketch !!

Press or hold the following keys to draw a face on your cake with toppings:

S = strawberry

R = raspberry

B= blueberry

I = top half of a kiwi slice

K = bottom half of kiwi slice

C = chocolate syrup

8 = sprinkles

((i don't have a refresh button yet., you're going to half to refresh the page to clear the cake. also sorry about the annoying console.))

post a screenshot of your cake face in the comments  (. ❛ ᴗ ❛.)
